data.title: Samsung Galaxy S6 (USA) Price in Pakistan
data.meta_description: Samsung Galaxy S6 (USA) Price in Pakistan, Samsung Galaxy S6 (Usa) Price In Pakistan Is Rs. 42,990 while in USD it is $ 488. To find out more
data.text:
Samsung Mobiles always tries to delivers the most advanced and appealing smartphone into the market. Samsung Mobiles has taken a step further into the technology. Samsung Galaxy S6 (Usa) coming in market by Samsung Mobiles. The Launch date Of Samsung Galaxy S6 (Usa) is 2015, April 06. Introducing necessary specification & features. The Samsung Galaxy S6 (Usa) Price In Pakistan Is Rs. 42,990 while in USD it is $ 488. To find out more about specs and price let’s have a look below.

Connectivity & Networking

Discussing about network, Samsung Galaxy S6 (Usa) supports variety of networks for the users to enjoy at any location. With a simple switch, the users can go from one network to another depending on the strength of the network. The networks supported in Samsung Galaxy S6 (Usa) are GSM / CDMA / HSPA / EVDO / LTE The details are listed below:

GSM 850 / 900 / 1800 / 1900 – G920V, G920P ,CDMA 800 / 1900 – G920V, G920P, G920R

HSDPA 850 / 900 / 1900 / 2100 – G920V ,CDMA2000 1xEV-DO – G920V, G920P, G920R

2, 3, 4, 5, 7, 13 – G920V ,2, 4, 5, 12, 25, 26, 41 – G920P ,2, 4, 5, 12, 13, 17, 25 – G920R

Samsung Galaxy S6 (Usa) connectivity options are

Wi-Fi 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac, dual-band, Wi-Fi Direct, hotspot

Bluetooth 4.1, A2DP, LE, aptX

Gps – A-GPS, GLONASS ,YesInfrared port,Yes

microUSB 2.0, USB On-The-Go

Samsung Galaxy S6 (Usa) Design

Samsung Galaxy S6 (Usa) comes with numerous features which not only make its appearance appealing but also very adjustable. The phone has a dimension of 143.5 x 70.6 x 6.9 mm (5.65 x 2.78 x 0.27 in) with a weight of 140 g (4.94 oz) Comfortable to move around. Moreover the build of Samsung Galaxy S6 (Usa) is Glass front (Gorilla Glass 4), glass back (Gorilla Glass 4), aluminum frame. It supports Nano-SIM Samsung Pay (Visa, MasterCard certified) option through you can get accessibility to different networks. This Phone comes with popular color options by i.e. White Pearl, Black Sapphire, Gold Platinum. The Samsung Galaxy S6 (Usa) sensors include Fingerprint (front-mounted), accelerometer, gyro, proximity, compass, barometer, heart rate, SpO2 ANT+ S-Voice natural language commands and dictation.

Display and Processor

This model has display size of 5.1 inches, 71.7 cm2 (~70.8% screen-to-body ratio), with resolution of 1440 x 2560 pixels, 16:9 ratio (~576 ppi density) which is enough to show optimal display. Samsung Galaxy S6 (Usa) display type is Super AMOLED capacitive touchscreen, 16M colors.

The Operating System in this Samsung Galaxy S6 (Usa) is Android 5.0.2 (Lollipop), upgradable to 5.1 (Lollipop), TouchWiz UI. The Chipset used in the smartphone is Exynos 7420 Octa (14 nm), with CPU Octa-core (4×2.1 GHz Cortex-A57 & 4×1.5 GHz Cortex-A53).

Memory

The Samsung Galaxy S6 (Usa) comes with the storage of 32GB

Camera

This phone offers 1 camera pack, Following is the list of resolution details of the main camera:

16 MP, f/1.9, 28mm (wide), 1/2.6″, 1.12µm, AF, OIS

To enjoy shooting & capturing you have got the popular features like : LED flash, auto-HDR, panorama , 4K@30fps, 1080p@30/60fps, 720p@120fps, HDR, stereo sound rec., OIS, gyro-EIS

The selfie camera has the following resolution details and features:

5 MP, f/1.9, 22mm (wide)

1440p@30fps

Moreover At the End

Loudspeaker is installed in the phone so that you don’t need to plug in any external. The Li-Ion 2550 mAh, non-removable; battery of Samsung Galaxy S6 (Usa) model gives continuous usage to users.
